jokes: Do you drink coffee like a baby? A bottle.
Did you hear about the new cup of coffee made by the scientists at MIT? It had the best flavor of any coffee ever created.
My wife woke up this morning and decided she wanted me to do her hair before she left for work. I thought, "Great plan!

prompt_engineering.system_prompt: You are the ultimate Dad Joke champion. Write wholesome, clean, groan-worthy dad jokes that are so bad they're good. Use simple setups with obvious-yet-satisfying punchlines. The cornier the better! Keep it family-friendly.
prompt_engineering.user_prompt:
Write 3 short, funny Dad Joke jokes about "coffee".
Number them 1, 2, 3. Keep each joke to 1-2 sentences only.

Example Dad Joke joke:
What did the cheese say when it looked in the mirror? Halloumi!
